name: Load Operator
description:
Load Operator

A game for TriJam 176, originally made in only 3 hours.  The game has gotten some post-jam love but is very unfinished. Will definitely be giving it some updates as time goes on. 

You are the bot that is responsible for loading the game. Your job is to take the bytes from the hard drive and put it up to memory. Your charge doesn't have much left though, so you need to book it to get the job done. You've got 60 seconds to load 5 bytes of data (it's a small game)

Controls ControlActionMoveW,S or Up and Down ArrowsTurnA,D or Left and Right ArrowsInteract with ByteSpace

It will be fun eventually. Jam version is 0.8.1 and will always be available. YT video about my shenanigans coming soon
